com.att.research.xacmlatt.pdp.test.policy

Class TestPolicy

  • java.lang.Object
    • java.nio.file.SimpleFileVisitor<java.nio.file.Path>
      • com.att.research.xacmlatt.pdp.test.TestBase
        • com.att.research.xacmlatt.pdp.test.policy.TestPolicy
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.nio.file.FileVisitor<java.nio.file.Path>

    public class TestPolicy
extends TestBase
    This class reads the policy in and extracts all the attributes and their values that is contained in the Policy. It then generates a request every single combination of attributes found. The attributes mostly come from the Target Match elements, since they have both an attribute designator/selector matched with an attribute value.
    Author:
    pameladragosh
